member.name: M:Monofoxe.Tiled.MapBuilder.Build
member.summary:
Builds map scene from Tiled map template.
Building goes in four stages: - Building tilesets. - Building tile layers. - Building object layers. - Building image layers.
Each of those stages can be overriden. Override this method if you want full control over the map loading.
